input.sentences: she got the pan ready to bake .
she started to put the first ingredient in .
the cheese was cut and measured .
the recipe book was open to the right page .
the ham was all chopped and ready to be added .
output.sentences: The cooking area was set up with all the ingredients an equipment needed for the recipe.
First, some of the ingredients required to be chopped.
Those items were then added to a wok, and sauteed.
More veggies are then added, giving the meal alot more flavor and color.
Finally, everything is added to a slow cooker bringing out the intense flavors of every ingredient for a delicious meal!
